title.rendered: Halt more rate hikes: ASSOCHAM to RBI

content.rendered:
The Monetary Policy Committee (MPC) of the Reserve Bank of India (RBI) should halt any more hikes in lending rates according to newly appointed President of the Associated Chambers of Commerce and Industry of India (ASSOCHAM), Ajay Singh. Addressing his first press conference after taking charge, Singh, who is also the Chairman and Managing Director of SpiceJet, said this pause should be in the wake of uncertainties in the global business environment.

Source  : https://tinyurl.com/2p8575ts
